BugId.Name: Navigation Bar (Home Page): Proceed button not responding

StepsToReprodece.Step_2: Click the drop-down menu in the navigation bar
StepsToReprodece.Step_3: Enter your email adress and click on the proceed button

BugDetails.ExpectedResult: I should've been taken to the player page when I clicked on the proceed button
BugDetails.ActualResult: When I clicked on the proceed button, it showed an "error" message
